summary: The agent report accurately identifies the root cause and provides logical reasoning, but it lacks some details in the causal chain and metric precision. The suggested actions are relevant but could be more specific.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM as the root cause of the VCORE increase.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is partially captured but lacks details on the CPU and DDR contributions.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent report correctly identifies the VCORE usage percentage but misses some DDR and CPU metrics.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are relevant but could be more specific.
